title: The 14 Best Nordstrom Bags For Every Fall Occasion
description: We can always count on Nordstrom as a go-to for our favorite shoes, sweaters, denim, and handbags. Aside from looking great, a quality bag should be able to hold all of your essentials while being easy to wear and versatile enough to be teamed with numerous outfits. We've uncovered a variety of options that incorporate the season's biggest trends while also considering longevity and practicality. Whether you need a small but elegant bag to carry to a fall wedding, a tote bag for your work commute, a crossbody or belt bag for travel, or a water-resistant bag for beach and pool days, we have options for everything. With a wide range of budgets in mind, there are affordable picks starting at just $50, as well as designer bags you'll wear for years. We've cherry-picked a mix of customer favorites, as well as an editor-reviewed bag for you to peruse. Despite what your personal aesthetic is or the type of bag you're looking for, you're bound to find just the right one to pair with everything from jeans to dresses. Keep reading to shop our favorite Nordstrom bags this season. Related: Nordstrom's Best Sweaters, From Cropped Cardigans to Mock Necks
author: Angela Elias
excerpt: The best bags at Nordstrom, including crossbody, shoulder, tote, and waist bags. We found options under $100, as well as designer bags worth the splurge.
text: While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.We can always count on Nordstrom as a go-to for our favorite shoes, sweaters, denim, and handbags. Aside from looking great, a quality bag should be able to hold all of your essentials while being easy to wear and versatile enough to be teamed with numerous outfits. We've uncovered a variety of options that incorporate the season's biggest trends while also considering longevity and practicality. Whether you need a small but elegant bag to carry to a fall wedding, a tote bag for your work commute, a crossbody or belt bag for travel, or a water-resistant bag for beach and pool days, we have options for everything. With a wide range of budgets in mind, there are affordable picks starting at just $50, as well as designer bags you'll wear for years. We've cherry-picked a mix of customer favorites, as well as an editor-reviewed bag for you to peruse. Despite what your personal aesthetic is or the type of bag you're looking for, you're bound to find just the right one to pair with everything from jeans to dresses. Keep reading to shop our favorite Nordstrom bags this season. nordstrom.comBest Mini Shopper BagMango Mini Faux Leather Shopper Bag ($50) The shopper shape of this bag feels undeniably classic. You can choose between using the top handle or the crossbody strap. It also has a zippered middle compartment to keep cash and other valuables safe.nordstrom.comBest Faux Leather SatchelAldo Kalanie Faux Leather Top Handle Bag ($70) The structured exterior of this bag opens up to reveal compartments, so it's easier to keep valuables intact. We love the gold hardware details and the longer strap that allows you to carry it on your arm or over your shoulder.nordstrom.comBest Vegan Leather ToteMali + Lili Ashley Vegan Leather Everyday Tote ($78) The vegan leather material gives this tote a sophisticated and durable feel and look. It includes two zippered pockets to store any important essentials and can be worn on the shoulder with the smaller straps.nordstrom.comBest Hobo BagJW PEI Gabbi Ruched Faux Leather Hobo ($89) This ruched faux leather bag has a distinct '90s vibe and comes in four different color options, ranging from versatile neutrals to bolder brights. It's a favorite among celebrities and is water-repellent, so it's ready for the rain.nordstrom.comBest Woven Leather Crossbody BagMadewell Puff Woven Crossbody Bag ($128) This versatile crossbody will quickly become your favorite everyday bag. The adjustable strap means you can wear it multiple ways, and the compact size is just big enough to carry all your essentials. Plus, it comes in three fall colors.nordstrom.comBest Belt BagDagne Dover Ace Belt Bag ($95) This belt bag is sporty, easy, and stylish. It's perfect for traveling because you can keep valuables close, and is also great for running errands. The water-resistant, scuba-knit fabric will keep anything you have inside dry, and the four pockets make it easy to stay organized.nordstrom.comBest Crochet Cotton ToteClare V. Michel Crochet Cotton Tote ($165) Between the bold stripes and "Le Vibe" lettering, this casual tote packs in plenty of style. It's the perfect bag to throw on with matching sweats, a trench, and sneakers for a cozy fall uniform. Our editor tested it out and thinks it gives Parisian mom vibes in the best way. For more details, read our Clare V. Michel Crochet Cotton Tote review. Editor quote: "Maybe it's the recent Paris-held olympics or my bon vivant aspirations, but I can't help but feel a little more chic with it draped on my shoulder. Am I en route to Saint-Tropez or soccer practice? Definitely the latter, but no one needs to know." — Angela Elias, contributing editor, Shoppingnordstrom.comBest Convertible ClutchAimee Kestenberg Chill Out Frame Clutch ($198) Keep the chunky gold chain on this clutch for an extra dose of edgy eye candy, or remove it for a clean and classic look. Either way, this roomy leather clutch — with its magnetic snap closure and interior wall and phone pockets — will become a staple for dinner and drinks.nordstrom.comBest Woven Tote BagNaghedi St. Barths Petit Tote ($225) Naghedi's woven bags are popping up everywhere, but we can't resist this bright coral option for fall. It's water-resistant and features an interior zipper pouch to keep your essentials organized. You can also choose to remove the crossbody strap and sling it around your wrist instead.nordstrom.comBest Large ToteTory Burch Ella Patent Nylon Tote ($248) If you're looking for a bigger tote to fit a laptop and other necessities, this nylon bag from Tory Burch is an excellent choice. It's made from recycled nylon and features patent faux leather straps and an emblem pocket where you can stash your phone and lip gloss.nordstrom.comBest Bow-Style BagCuyana Mini Bow Leather Top Handle Bag ($298) Sculptural and elegant, we love how this Cuyana bow bag can be worn around the shoulder with the gold chain or as a minimal clutch with the chain removed. It's crafted in Italy with a pebbled leather exterior, has an interior wall pocket, and also comes in black.nordstrom.comBest Leather ToteKate Spade New York Knott Medium Leather Tote ($348) For a medium-sized leather tote, we love this Kate Spade New York option. It's simple and elegant, but the knotted handle feels a little unexpected. The strap is adjustable and detachable, and you can choose from three different colors.nordstrom.comBest Checkered BagClare V. Midi Sac Woven Leather Crossbody Bag ($375) Between the boxy shape and checkerboard woven leather, there's a lot to love about this bag. It includes a detachable strap that you can switch with other straps to change up the look. We love how it adds a pop of pattern to a basic outfit.-— Additional reporting by Natasha MarshAngela Elias is a contributing editor for PS Shopping. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments for TV Guide Network and video content for brands like Pier 1 and Walgreens. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.Natasha Marsh is a freelance writer who writes about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Prior to freelancing, she held styling staff positions at The Wall Street Journal, Burberry, Cosmopolitan, British GQ, and Harper's Bazaar.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

We can always count on Nordstrom as a go-to for our favorite shoes, sweaters, denim, and handbags. Aside from looking great, a quality bag should be able to hold all of your essentials while being easy to wear and versatile enough to be teamed with numerous outfits. We've uncovered a variety of options that incorporate the season's biggest trends while also considering longevity and practicality. Whether you need a small but elegant bag to carry to a fall wedding, a tote bag for your work commute, a crossbody or belt bag for travel, or a water-resistant bag for beach and pool days, we have options for everything.

With a wide range of budgets in mind, there are affordable picks starting at just $50, as well as designer bags you'll wear for years. We've cherry-picked a mix of customer favorites, as well as an editor-reviewed bag for you to peruse. Despite what your personal aesthetic is or the type of bag you're looking for, you're bound to find just the right one to pair with everything from jeans to dresses. Keep reading to shop our favorite Nordstrom bags this season.

Best Mini Shopper Bag

Mango Mini Faux Leather Shopper Bag ($50)

The shopper shape of this bag feels undeniably classic. You can choose between using the top handle or the crossbody strap. It also has a zippered middle compartment to keep cash and other valuables safe.

Best Faux Leather Satchel

Aldo Kalanie Faux Leather Top Handle Bag ($70)

The structured exterior of this bag opens up to reveal compartments, so it's easier to keep valuables intact. We love the gold hardware details and the longer strap that allows you to carry it on your arm or over your shoulder.

Best Vegan Leather Tote

Mali + Lili Ashley Vegan Leather Everyday Tote ($78)

The vegan leather material gives this tote a sophisticated and durable feel and look. It includes two zippered pockets to store any important essentials and can be worn on the shoulder with the smaller straps.

Best Hobo Bag

JW PEI Gabbi Ruched Faux Leather Hobo ($89)

This ruched faux leather bag has a distinct '90s vibe and comes in four different color options, ranging from versatile neutrals to bolder brights. It's a favorite among celebrities and is water-repellent, so it's ready for the rain.

Best Woven Leather Crossbody Bag

Madewell Puff Woven Crossbody Bag ($128)

This versatile crossbody will quickly become your favorite everyday bag. The adjustable strap means you can wear it multiple ways, and the compact size is just big enough to carry all your essentials. Plus, it comes in three fall colors.

Best Belt Bag

Dagne Dover Ace Belt Bag ($95)

This belt bag is sporty, easy, and stylish. It's perfect for traveling because you can keep valuables close, and is also great for running errands. The water-resistant, scuba-knit fabric will keep anything you have inside dry, and the four pockets make it easy to stay organized.

Best Crochet Cotton Tote

Clare V. Michel Crochet Cotton Tote ($165)

Between the bold stripes and "Le Vibe" lettering, this casual tote packs in plenty of style. It's the perfect bag to throw on with matching sweats, a trench, and sneakers for a cozy fall uniform. Our editor tested it out and thinks it gives Parisian mom vibes in the best way. For more details, read our Clare V. Michel Crochet Cotton Tote review.

Editor quote: "Maybe it's the recent Paris-held olympics or my bon vivant aspirations, but I can't help but feel a little more chic with it draped on my shoulder. Am I en route to Saint-Tropez or soccer practice? Definitely the latter, but no one needs to know." — Angela Elias, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Convertible Clutch

Aimee Kestenberg Chill Out Frame Clutch ($198)

Keep the chunky gold chain on this clutch for an extra dose of edgy eye candy, or remove it for a clean and classic look. Either way, this roomy leather clutch — with its magnetic snap closure and interior wall and phone pockets — will become a staple for dinner and drinks.

Best Woven Tote Bag

Naghedi St. Barths Petit Tote ($225)

Naghedi's woven bags are popping up everywhere, but we can't resist this bright coral option for fall. It's water-resistant and features an interior zipper pouch to keep your essentials organized. You can also choose to remove the crossbody strap and sling it around your wrist instead.

Best Large Tote

Tory Burch Ella Patent Nylon Tote ($248)

If you're looking for a bigger tote to fit a laptop and other necessities, this nylon bag from Tory Burch is an excellent choice. It's made from recycled nylon and features patent faux leather straps and an emblem pocket where you can stash your phone and lip gloss.

Best Bow-Style Bag

Cuyana Mini Bow Leather Top Handle Bag ($298)

Sculptural and elegant, we love how this Cuyana bow bag can be worn around the shoulder with the gold chain or as a minimal clutch with the chain removed. It's crafted in Italy with a pebbled leather exterior, has an interior wall pocket, and also comes in black.

Best Leather Tote

Kate Spade New York Knott Medium Leather Tote ($348)

For a medium-sized leather tote, we love this Kate Spade New York option. It's simple and elegant, but the knotted handle feels a little unexpected. The strap is adjustable and detachable, and you can choose from three different colors.

Best Checkered Bag

Clare V. Midi Sac Woven Leather Crossbody Bag ($375)

Between the boxy shape and checkerboard woven leather, there's a lot to love about this bag. It includes a detachable strap that you can switch with other straps to change up the look. We love how it adds a pop of pattern to a basic outfit.

— Additional reporting by Natasha Marsh

Angela Elias is a contributing editor for PS Shopping. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments for TV Guide Network and video content for brands like Pier 1 and Walgreens. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.

Natasha Marsh is a freelance writer who writes about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Prior to freelancing, she held styling staff positions at The Wall Street Journal, Burberry, Cosmopolitan, British GQ, and Harper's Bazaar.
